QuestData.Title: Matters of Loyalty
QuestData.Description: I have no authority over such matters. You must speak to our leader, Drek'Thar. I have already sent word of your arrival to Frostwolf Keep. Drek'Thar will be out to speak with you personally.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to High Warlord Cromush at Tarren Mill in Hillsbrad Foothills.
QuestData.RewardText: <High Warlord Cromush's face turns white.>$B$BTHEY HAVE FORSAKEN US? THEY HAVE FORSAKEN THE HORDE? This cannot be!$B$BI...$B$B<Cromush falls to one knee.>$B$BI... I WILL BE FINE. We will do this without their aid. To hell with the Frostwolf!
